remove.description: Do You really want to remove this entry

pending.description:
Management of the issues that are about to be resolved one day. Allows to track down the contacts and adding notes based information about current progress in given case.
Each entry can also contain an Todo list due to the fact typically some personal cases require set of actions to be resolved in the process.

hover.notDisplayed: This box is not visible on the dashboard
hover.displayed: This box is visible on the dashboard
